title: The Complexity of Chemistry Mindset Beliefs: A Multiple Case Study Approach
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4RP00068D, Paper
Deborah L Santos, Suazette Reid Mooring
Mindset is a construct of interest for challenging learning environments, as science courses often are, in that it has implications for behavioral responses to academic challenges. Previous work examining mindset...
